name: Cream Sinamay Top Hat with Cream/Gold Net
description:
Lovely fresh Cream coloured mini top hat with a Cream/Gold spotted veiling going all around the hat, gathering detail at very back of hat, would look great for a wedding as its cream and the gold spotted veiling adds a bit of glamour also great for any other occasion. this hat can be worn on the top of the head or just to the side both look great but it all comes down to personal preference. If you like the design of this headpiece but would prefer it in a matching colour to your outfit then please do get in touch as a can dye most materials to match an outfit.

	All ready made headpieces are sent to you via Royal Mail special delivery which is guaranteed next day, packaged with soft paper tissue so no damage occurs during travel, if you would like it sent by any other courier please contact me before buying! Thank you!

name: Black Fasinator with Red Arrow Feathers and Black spot Veiling
description:
Black Sinamay Fascinator with Red Ostrich Arrowhead feathers with Black spot veiling, quite a sexy sophisticated piece.

	If you like the design of this headpiece but would prefer it in a matching colour to your outfit then please do get in touch as a can dye most materials to match an outfit.

name: Mini Black Top Hat with Red & Black feathers
description:
Mini version of a classical top hat decorated with a velvet ribbon and a small spray of black and dark red feathers and burnt peacock, a mini top hat is great for those party nights while looking glamourous with a classic touch!

	If you like the design of this headpiece but would prefer it in a matching colour to your outfit then please do get in touch as a can dye most materials to match an outfit.
